inputs.topic_discovery_motivation: Article discusses the performance of a top golfer in a major championship, which may relate to sports investment trends and market sentiment around sports events.

category.motivation: The article discusses a sports event, which does not fit any of the predefined categories.

impact.motivation: The article reports a major event involving the node, detailing a top-ranked athlete’s performance in a high-profile tournament, which is highly relevant to the node’s significance.

time_frame.motivation: The article focuses on the ongoing 2025 Tour Championship and Scheffler’s immediate performance, detailing current round results and upcoming play.

article_node.title: Tour Championship: Second round tee times, how to watch, leaderboard today
article_node.summary: Scottie Scheffler, the World No. 1 golfer, is competing in the 2025 Tour Championship, having started strong with a 7-under 63 in the first round, placing him just behind leader Russell Henley. Due to expected rain, the second round will begin earlier than usual, with tee times starting at 8 a.m. ET. Scheffler is already the top FedEx Cup points leader and aims to secure his position in the final event of the PGA Tour season.
